project.name: Memory Times
project.image:
1.jpg Untitled #01 (Unknown feedback), 2015
Memory Times is an ongoing project by Kira Björklund and Jose Jompero.
It is a digitally published dialogue of photographs, texts, moving image and sound.
The previous entry sets ignition, allowing an endless visual conversation.
The entries are posted alternately by Kira and Jose.

http://justdownthestreet.tumblr.com/
